oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. Alonzo Swift, Co. E, 137th N.Y. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Swift was from Castle Creek (N.Y.) and served as a teamster. In this letter he describes visiting either the Chiristian or Sanitary Commission and spends a great deal of time in the letter talking of spiritual matters. He describes the Commission agent, "The agents name is Mr. Strong from Mass. I do not know what part of the state. I think him to be a good man and I hope he may be ful (sic) of the Holy Gost (sic). Oh how much we need that gift and may God bless you with that gift and all the children "
